mapper.update: update car set ropute_ID = #{roputeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_Type = #{carType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_Orgin = #{carOrgin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_ProDate = #{carProdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, car_BuyDate = #{carBuydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, car_capaCity = #{carCapacity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, car_State = #{carState,jdbcType=BIT}, Comments = #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where car_ID = #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select car_ID, ropute_ID, car_Type, car_Orgin, car_ProDate, car_BuyDate, car_capaCity, car_State, Comments from car where car_ID = #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select car_ID, ropute_ID, car_Type, car_Orgin, car_ProDate, car_BuyDate, car_capaCity, car_State, Comments from car
